title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In purple crayon at bottom left corner: Designed by A. Hass Age 13, Instructor J. Rohr, Federal Art Project, Educational Alliance; screen printed at bottom: Designed by ____ Age ____ Instructor A. Hass, Federal Art Project, The Educational Alliance
dimensions:
H x W: 83.8 x 87.6 cm (33 in. x 34 1/2 in.)
Repeat H x W: 15.3 x 38 cm (6 x 14 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Textile printed with diagonal repeat (horizontal and vertical half drop) design of bridge over water showing boats and buildings. Printed in grey, pink, yellow, green, and two shades of blue.

participants.person_name: The Works Progress Administration, Federal Art Project
